attributes.additional_details:
Keep Harmony Nursery open! How can we promote parents going back to work, without providing the necessary fundamental tools such as childcare? CLOSING Harmony nursery will have a major detrimental impact on parents & children's lives.It will be a major upheaval and could cause some parents to lose their jobs. Such decisions must not be taken lightly.("Sure Start is at the heart of the Government's vision for early intervention - that's why we have ensured there is enough money in the system to maintain the network of Sure Start children's centres'' - Sarah Teather, MP)
With Sarah's quote in mind, why are we facing closure of such a well run, well utilised nursery? This decision has to be reconsidered..
